attributes.action: Proclaim the 16th of September Owain Glyndwr day and make it a bank holiday in Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wales' greatest hero, Owain Glyndwr, needs to be remembered. Forget about St.David's day, we are no longer a Christian country. Lets remember somebody who fought against foreign invaders and stood up for Wales.
